description: Meshery Models serve as a portable unit of packaging to define managed entities, their relationships, and capabilities.

schemaVersion.description: Specifies the version of the schema used for the definition.

version.description: Version of the model definition. Uses semantic version.

name.description: The name for the model. Must be unique within scope of a registrant.

displayName.description: Name for the model in human-readible format.

status.$comment:
duplicate // this component is a duplicate of another. The component that is to be the canonical reference and that is duplicated by other components should not be assigned the 'duplicate' status 
 maintenance // unavailable for a period of time
enabled //
disabled //

      ignored //
 available //
 publish //

registrant.description: Kind of the Connection responsible for the sourcing and registration of entities. Example ArtifactHub, GitHub, Meshery-Istio adapter...

metadata.description: Metadata contains additional information associated with the model.

isAnnotation.description: Identifies whether the model and all its entities should be treated as deployable entity or be treated as logical representation.

model.description: Metadata contains additional information associated with the model.

version.description: Version of the model as defined by the registrant.
